title: Thought on the patch currently in PBE?

embed.description: This is a W ORK I N P ROGRESS POST - check back for constant updates now that today's patch out.][ Status: The PBE currently still down for maintenance.] To kick off the 5.13 PBE cycle we have a HUGE patch! Continue reading for more information!

body: This is pretty big! I like Tahm Kench's kit and I like Gentelman Gnar. But I'm currently more worried about the AP items! Thoughts on those?

replies.body:
Basically it's that mid season meta shift that happens.

Honestly it's hard to tell what will happen but from what i can tell, nearly every AP item is being streamlined into around about the same AP level.

This makes 2 changes:
1. Rabadon's is now core, no matter what.
2. There will bring actual diversity in builds game to game and player to player.

However 1 thing i notice personally, Archangel's staff when fully stacked is probably going to be the biggest AP item aside from rabadon's so a lot more late game power houses (think Orianna style) are going to be happy with this change overall, especially those that like a RoA and a Tear.

Of course i think these changes aren't necessarily final, and will probably change once they hit the PBE from a long enough time.

Hmmm Hello Cass huh?!

I perosnally don't like Tear on Ori she needa that cdr man! But yeah I agree with you on every point. So happy with the Liandrys change though! Just want a tank killing item for mids! Finally it gives you a decent amount of AP

Getting tear doesn't stop you getting the CDR

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/94468734/200474676?tab=overview

Tear > Morello > (possible early seekers) > Luden's

Personally that's how i build my Orianna these day's

Also the liandry's changes are mediocre for tank killing at best and you'd still favor an actual void staff (except in the cases you have DoT and already consider Liandry's)
